an5.175:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato upasako upasakacandalo ca hoti upasakamalanca upasakapatikuttho ca.
an5.175:1.5: kotuhalamangaliko hoti, mangalam pacceti no kammam;
an5.175:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato upasako upasakacandalo ca hoti upasakamalanca upasakapatikuttho ca.
an5.175:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato upasako upasakaratananca hoti upasakapadumanca upasakapundarikanca.
an5.175:2.5: akotuhalamangaliko hoti, kammam pacceti no mangalam;
an5.175:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato upasako upasakaratananca hoti upasakapadumanca upasakapundarikanca”ti.
